### writeBytes() {#abe3861e116c9da3ce15c4dd46a1bfaf7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error WritableMappedBlockStream::writeBytes (uint64&#95;t Offset, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; uint8&#95;t &gt; Data)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Attempt to write the given bytes into the stream at the desired offset.

This will always necessitate a copy. Cannot shrink or grow the stream, only writes into existing allocated space.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/msf/mappedblockstream-h/#l00134">134</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/msf/mappedblockstream-h">MappedBlockStream.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/msf/mappedblockstream-cpp/#l00385">385</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/msf/mappedblockstream-cpp">MappedBlockStream.cpp</a>.
